captions.text: Akte Blanix III in short is the dream of flying
We're glider pilots and for us as well as for the Red Bull Skydive Team this is central to what we do.
The thin line between freefall and flying is where we want to meet.
A formation between Blaniks gliders and skydivers
That was great! Goosebumps on my back mean it went exactly as it should have!
Yes! Perfect! This is how it should be!

title: Wing suit team and acrobatic gliders stunt flying - Akte Blanix 3
